channel.title: Runecrafting help

item.title: Runecrafting help
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

ok i just want a caseâ€¦ this is the case i created and it wont work, dont you think it would work? it doesnt come up with any errors, but then it doesnt work! help

//RUNECRAFTING case 2478: if(playerLevel[20] >= 1) { if(playerLevel[20] < 5) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(554, 50); addItem(555, 50); addItem(556, 50); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } else if(playerLevel[20] >= 70) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(554, 500); addItem(555, 500); addItem(556, 500); addItem(557, 500); addItem(558, 500); addItem(559, 500); addItem(560, 500); addItem(561, 500); addItem(562, 500); addItem(563, 500); addItem(564, 500); addItem(565, 500); addItem(566, 500); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } else if(playerLevel[20] >= 55) { if(playerLevel[20] < 70) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(554, 500); addItem(555, 500); addItem(556, 500); addItem(557, 500); addItem(558, 500); addItem(559, 500); addItem(560, 500); addItem(561, 500); addItem(562, 500); addItem(563, 500); addItem(564, 500); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } else if(playerLevel[20] >= 30) { if(playerLevel[20] < 55) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(554, 50); addItem(555, 50); addItem(556, 50); addItem(557, 50); addItem(558, 50); addItem(559, 50); addItem(560, 50); addItem(561, 50); addItem(562, 50); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } else if(playerLevel[20] >= 15) { if(playerLevel[20] < 30) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(554, 50); addItem(555, 50); addItem(556, 50); addItem(557, 50); addItem(558, 50); addItem(559, 50); addItem(560, 50); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } else if(playerLevel[20] >= 5) { if(playerLevel[20] < 15) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Craft Runes !"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(791); playerGfx(186, 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[20]), 20); addItem(554, 50); addItem(555, 50); addItem(556, 50); addItem(557, 50); addItem(558, 50); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } break; //END OF RUNECRAFTING
